import React, { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/General.css'; import '../styles/DataItem.css'; import { Fade, Flip } from 'react-reveal'; import Jello from 'react-reveal/Jello'; import DataItemCard from './DataItemCard'; function DataItem({navType, payload, animationType, bothListener, setBothListener}) { return ( <> { (navType === 'Both' && bothListener === false) ?
: (navType === 'Both' && bothListener === true) ? // (animationType === 'Fade') ? : (animationType === 'Flip') ? : :null /*(navType === 'Skeleton') ?
: (animationType === 'Fade') ? : (animationType === 'Flip') ? : */ } ) } export default DataItem
